snippet: The police did not release the victims’ names, but the pilot was Daniel T. Kirk, his father, Donald Kirk, confirmed.
abstract: Virginia State Police say searchers have found body of third person who was aboard hot-air balloon that drifted into power line, burst into flames and fell into dense woods about 25 miles north of Richmond; body found was that of balloon's pilot, Daniel T Kirk; relatives of other victims identify them as Ginny Doyle and Natalie Lewis, both affiliated with the University of Richmond's women's basketball team.
lead_paragraph: The police did not release the victims’ names, but the pilot was Daniel T. Kirk, his father, Donald Kirk, confirmed.

headline.main: Pilot’s Body Found After Hot-Air Balloon Fire That Killed 3
headline.print_headline: Pilot’s Body Found After Hot-Air Balloon Fire That Killed 3
